seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Book a calm exploratory chat with SustainSage. Share your context, understand our boundaries, and decide whether coaching fits your reality.

hero.title: A 20-minute exploratory chat—not a sales call.
hero.subtitle: Tell us what is shifting in your life. We will clarify together whether coaching is the right kind of support.

preForm.title: Before you write
bullets: Share the transition or decision you are navigating and anything that would help us prepare.
We use your information only to reply, schedule the chat, and keep records required by coaching ethics.
We will not add you to marketing lists or share your details without consent, unless law requires it.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Short bullet points are enough. You stay in control of what you disclose.
form.name: Name
form.help: What transition or decision is on your mind?
form.helpHint: Examples: relocating to the UK, returning to work after caregiving, cross-cultural leadership, feeling unsure about next steps.
form.focusHint: Choose the option that feels closest—it is fine to stay uncertain.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. UK mornings, GMT+8 evenings, or flexible
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching.
form.scopeAcknowledgement: I understand this form is for coaching enquiries, not therapy, crisis support, legal, financial, or immigration advice.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only to arrange coaching conversations and delete it if we do not work together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within three UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

sidebar.title: What to expect
sidebar.description: We keep the process transparent and centred on your consent.
sidebar.responseCopy: We usually reply within three UK working days with a few options for the exploratory chat.
sidebar.privacyCopy: Your details stay between us unless the law requires disclosure. No marketing lists or surprise emails.
sidebar.nextCopy: You choose whether to continue coaching. We summarise agreements and boundaries so you stay in control.

items.question: What happens after I submit this form?
items.answer: We reply within three UK working days with a few time slots. During the call we clarify focus, boundaries, and whether coaching fits.

items.question: Which languages can we use?
items.answer: We coach in English and Mandarin. You can switch languages mid-conversation if that helps express nuance.

items.question: I’m not sure if coaching is right for me—can we talk about that?
items.answer: Absolutely. The intro chat is for exploring fit. We will suggest next steps or other resources if coaching isn’t the right support.
